title: How a $3 Clock Became a Priceless Personalized Gift
description: As the school year draws to a close, parents often find themselves searching for the perfect way to say thank you to their children’s teachers. Marleen K. and her young son have come up with a charming and budget-friendly solution using the IKEA TROMMA wall clock. “My youngest son is going from preschool to kindergarten, so we needed a simple but nice farewell gift for his very nice teachers,” Marleen explains. The result is a colorful and personalized timepiece that’s […] The post How a $3 Clock Became a Priceless Personalized Gift appeared first on IKEA Hackers.

title: 7 IKEA Hacks That’ll Make Your Pinterest Followers Drool
